Coronation Street viewers couldn't cope with emotional scenes as Michelle was left devastated following Steve's baby bombshell - and punched Leanne in anger. 
She was heartbroken after it was revealed Leanne and Nick's baby was fathered by Steve, and scenes on Friday night saw her vomiting in a toilet as she ranted at her friend. 
"He was nowhere near as devastated as I was. Because he had a spare," she sobbed as she opened up on their miscarriage pain. "It wasn't shared, was it? Because I was totally on my own." Michelle was heartbroken (Photo: ITV) 
Fans were heartbroken too, tweeting: "Wow how emotional is @itvcorrie tonight totally heartbroken for #Michelle" She couldn't believe the bombshell (Photo: ITV) The episode focused on her anger (Photo: ITV) 
Until now, the real identity of the boy's dad has been kept a secret - but Steve couldn't stop himself as he was left cradling the child that everyone on the cobbles though was Nick and Leanne's. 
It all goes down at Nick's Bistro, with Michelle and her man caught up in a last minute bash thrown by Gail to celebrate the baby she thinks is her new grandson. The cat is out of the bag 
Steve was left holding the baby and, in the closing moments of the first of Friday's episodes, said: "I'm sorry... that's my baby."
